block.name: apm_baaw
block.comment: APM Base Address remapper and Access Window (BAAW) configuration registers. Not instanced in the RTL.

register.name: APM_BAAW_START0
register.comment: 24 MSbits for the 36-bit address corresponding to the start of range 0(WLBT CPU programmer's view)

register.name: APM_BAAW_END0
register.comment: 24 MSbits for the 36-bit address corresponding to the end of range 0(WLBT CPU programmer's view)

register.name: APM_BAAW_REMAP0
register.comment: 24 MSbits for the 36-bit address corresponding to the start of the range 0(AP CPU programmer's view)

register.name: APM_BAAW_ENABLE_DONE0
register.comment: Control bits for range 0

register.name: APM_BAAW_START1
register.comment: 24 MSbits for the 36-bit address corresponding to the start of range 1(WLBT CPU programmer's view)

register.name: APM_BAAW_END1
register.comment: 24 MSbits for the 36-bit address corresponding to the end of range 1(WLBT CPU programmer's view)

register.name: APM_BAAW_REMAP1
register.comment: 24 MSbits for the 36-bit address corresponding to the start of the range 1(AP CPU programmer's view)

register.name: APM_BAAW_ENABLE_DONE1
register.comment: Control bits for range 1

register.name: APM_BAAW_START2
register.comment: 24 MSbits for the 36-bit address corresponding to the start of range 2(WLBT CPU programmer's view)

register.name: APM_BAAW_END2
register.comment: 24 MSbits for the 36-bit address corresponding to the end of range 2(WLBT CPU programmer's view)

register.name: APM_BAAW_REMAP2
register.comment: 24 MSbits for the 36-bit address corresponding to the start of the range 2(AP CPU programmer's view)

register.name: APM_BAAW_ENABLE_DONE2
register.comment: Control bits for range 2

register.name: APM_BAAW_START3
register.comment: 24 MSbits for the 36-bit address corresponding to the start of range 3(WLBT CPU programmer's view)

register.name: APM_BAAW_END3
register.comment: 24 MSbits for the 36-bit address corresponding to the end of range 3(WLBT CPU programmer's view)

register.name: APM_BAAW_REMAP3
register.comment: 24 MSbits for the 36-bit address corresponding to the start of the range 3(AP CPU programmer's view)

register.name: APM_BAAW_ENABLE_DONE3
register.comment: Control bits for range 3

register.name: APM_BAAW_START4
register.comment: 24 MSbits for the 36-bit address corresponding to the start of range 4(WLBT CPU programmer's view)

register.name: APM_BAAW_END4
register.comment: 24 MSbits for the 36-bit address corresponding to the end of range 4(WLBT CPU programmer's view)

register.name: APM_BAAW_REMAP4
register.comment: 24 MSbits for the 36-bit address corresponding to the start of the range 4(AP CPU programmer's view)

register.name: APM_BAAW_ENABLE_DONE4
register.comment: Control bits for range 4

register.name: APM_BAAW_START5
register.comment: 24 MSbits for the 36-bit address corresponding to the start of range 5(WLBT CPU programmer's view)

register.name: APM_BAAW_END5
register.comment: 24 MSbits for the 36-bit address corresponding to the end of range 5(WLBT CPU programmer's view)

register.name: APM_BAAW_REMAP5
register.comment: 24 MSbits for the 36-bit address corresponding to the start of the range 5(AP CPU programmer's view)

register.name: APM_BAAW_ENABLE_DONE5
register.comment: Control bits for range 5

register.name: APM_BAAW_START6
register.comment: 24 MSbits for the 36-bit address corresponding to the start of range 6(WLBT CPU programmer's view)

register.name: APM_BAAW_END6
register.comment: 24 MSbits for the 36-bit address corresponding to the end of range 6(WLBT CPU programmer's view)

register.name: APM_BAAW_REMAP6
register.comment: 24 MSbits for the 36-bit address corresponding to the start of the range 6(AP CPU programmer's view)

register.name: APM_BAAW_ENABLE_DONE6
register.comment: Control bits for range 6

register.name: APM_BAAW_START7
register.comment: 24 MSbits for the 36-bit address corresponding to the start of range 7(WLBT CPU programmer's view)

register.name: APM_BAAW_END7
register.comment: 24 MSbits for the 36-bit address corresponding to the end of range 7(WLBT CPU programmer's view)

register.name: APM_BAAW_REMAP7
register.comment: 24 MSbits for the 36-bit address corresponding to the start of the range 7(AP CPU programmer's view)

register.name: APM_BAAW_ENABLE_DONE7
register.comment: Control bits for range 7

register.name: APM_BAAW_START8
register.comment: 24 MSbits for the 36-bit address corresponding to the start of range 8(WLBT CPU programmer's view)

register.name: APM_BAAW_END8
register.comment: 24 MSbits for the 36-bit address corresponding to the end of range 8(WLBT CPU programmer's view)

register.name: APM_BAAW_REMAP8
register.comment: 24 MSbits for the 36-bit address corresponding to the start of the range 8(AP CPU programmer's view)

register.name: APM_BAAW_ENABLE_DONE8
register.comment: Control bits for range 8

block.name: mif_baaw
block.comment: MIF Base Address remapper and Access Window (BAAW) configuration registers. Not instanced in the RTL.

register.name: MIF_BAAW_START0
register.comment: 24 MSbits for the 36-bit address corresponding to the start of range 0(WLBT CPU programmer's view)

register.name: MIF_BAAW_END0
register.comment: 24 MSbits for the 36-bit address corresponding to the end of range 0(WLBT CPU programmer's view)

register.name: MIF_BAAW_REMAP0
register.comment: 24 MSbits for the 36-bit address corresponding to the start of the range 0(AP CPU programmer's view)

register.name: MIF_BAAW_ENABLE_DONE0
register.comment: Control bits for range 0

register.name: MIF_BAAW_START1
register.comment: 24 MSbits for the 36-bit address corresponding to the start of range 1(WLBT CPU programmer's view)

register.name: MIF_BAAW_END1
register.comment: 24 MSbits for the 36-bit address corresponding to the end of range 1(WLBT CPU programmer's view)

register.name: MIF_BAAW_REMAP1
register.comment: 24 MSbits for the 36-bit address corresponding to the start of the range 1(AP CPU programmer's view)

register.name: MIF_BAAW_ENABLE_DONE1
register.comment: Control bits for range 1

register.name: MIF_BAAW_START2
register.comment: 24 MSbits for the 36-bit address corresponding to the start of range 2(WLBT CPU programmer's view)

register.name: MIF_BAAW_END2
register.comment: 24 MSbits for the 36-bit address corresponding to the end of range 2(WLBT CPU programmer's view)

register.name: MIF_BAAW_REMAP2
register.comment: 24 MSbits for the 36-bit address corresponding to the start of the range 2(AP CPU programmer's view)

register.name: MIF_BAAW_ENABLE_DONE2
register.comment: Control bits for range 2

register.name: MIF_BAAW_START3
register.comment: 24 MSbits for the 36-bit address corresponding to the start of range 3(WLBT CPU programmer's view)

register.name: MIF_BAAW_END3
register.comment: 24 MSbits for the 36-bit address corresponding to the end of range 3(WLBT CPU programmer's view)

register.name: MIF_BAAW_REMAP3
register.comment: 24 MSbits for the 36-bit address corresponding to the start of the range 3(AP CPU programmer's view)

register.name: MIF_BAAW_ENABLE_DONE3
register.comment: Control bits for range 3

register.name: MIF_BAAW_START4
register.comment: 24 MSbits for the 36-bit address corresponding to the start of range 4(WLBT CPU programmer's view)

register.name: MIF_BAAW_END4
register.comment: 24 MSbits for the 36-bit address corresponding to the end of range 4(WLBT CPU programmer's view)

register.name: MIF_BAAW_REMAP4
register.comment: 24 MSbits for the 36-bit address corresponding to the start of the range 4(AP CPU programmer's view)

register.name: MIF_BAAW_ENABLE_DONE4
register.comment: Control bits for range 4

register.name: BOOT_SOURCE
register.comment: KA RAM access source.

register.name: BOOT_CFG_ACK
register.comment: Configuration ACK

register.name: AP2WB_MAILBOX
register.comment: AP-accessible mailbox register. Writing to this generates an interrupt.

register.name: WB2AP_MAILBOX
register.comment: AP-accessible mailbox register. Read-only status from PMU return register.

block.name: pmu_sysreg
block.comment: SYSREG configuration. The generated RTL from this XML file is not instantiated. The G2 SYSREG output is used. This XML file is just for software.

register.name: USER_REG0
register.comment: Spare Register

register.name: USER_REG1
register.comment: Spare Register

register.name: USER_REG2
register.comment: Spare Register

register.name: USER_REG3
register.comment: Spare Register

register.name: USER_REG4
register.comment: Spare Register

register.name: SFR_APB
register.comment: 0= Disable the timeout of SFR APBIF 1= Enable the timeout of SFR APBIF

register.name: BUS_COMPONENT_DRCG_EN
register.comment: 0= Disable Dynamic Root Clock Gating 1= Enable Dynamic Root Clock Gating

register.name: MEMCLK_EN
register.comment: Memory Clock Enable

register.name: LPP_MCS
register.comment: RAM Margin controls

register.name: LPP_MCSW
register.comment: RAM Margin controls

register.name: LPP_MCSRD
register.comment: RAM Margin controls

register.name: LPP_MCSWR
register.comment: RAM Margin controls

register.name: LPP_KCS
register.comment: RAM Margin controls

register.name: LPP_ADME
register.comment: RAM Margin controls

register.name: LPP_WRME
register.comment: RAM Margin controls

register.name: EMA_STATUS
register.comment: RAM Margin control-status

register.name: PROC_RMP_BOOT_ADDR
register.comment: Remapping boot address for WLAN PD CPU

register.name: WPAN_RMP_BOOT_ADDR
register.comment: Remapping boot address for WPAN PD CPU

register.name: SWEEPER_DBUS_BYPASS
register.comment: Bypass DBUS Sweeper

register.name: SWEEPER_PBUS_BYPASS
register.comment: Bypass PBUS Sweeper

register.name: BPS_SEL_RESP
register.comment: BPS clear request AXI response

register.name: CHIP_VERSION_ID
register.comment: Chip version IDs

block.name: pmu_tzpc
block.comment: TrustZone configuration. This is not instanced in the RTL. A TrustZone register block from G2 is used. This is just for software.

register.name: TZPC_PROT0STAT
register.comment: TrustZone status for register banks, aliased to 0x200

register.name: TZPC_PROT0SET
register.comment: TrustZone set for register banks, aliased to 0x204

register.name: TZPC_PROT0CLR
register.comment: TrustZone clear for register banks, aliased to 0x208

register.name: TZPC_PROT1STAT
register.comment: TrustZone status for register banks, aliased to 0x210

register.name: TZPC_PROT1SET
register.comment: TrustZone set for register banks, aliased to 0x214

register.name: TZPC_PROT1CLR
register.comment: TrustZone clear for register banks, aliased to 0x218

register.name: TZPC_R0SIZE
register.comment: TrustZone size register aliased to 0x220
